plend1: End plotting session for current stream

plend1 ();

Ends a plotting session for the current output stream only. See plsstrm for more info.

Redacted form: plend1()

This function is used in examples 1,20.

plend: End plotting sessionUpplenv0: Same as plenv but if in multiplot mode does not advance the subpage, instead clears it.
